attributes.action: create a Heavy Metal radio station
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that todays radio stations are too influenced by rap and other alternative music. I feel that heavy metal bands such as Metallica, Megadeth,Iron Maiden, Rammstein, Bullet for my Valentine and many others are underrepresented and should be given apprpriate air time.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
